text: Rwose uzasanga Abayahudi n’ababangikanyamana ari bo barusha abandi kugirira abemeramana urwango rukomeye. Uzasanga kandi abiteguye gukunda abemeramana (Abayisilamu) ari abavuga bati “Mu by’ukuri, twe turi Abanaswara.” Ibyo ni uko muri bo harimo abamenyi n’abihaye Imana, kandi bakaba batagira ubwibone (mu kwemera ukuri)
